CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Two different types of photovoltaic devices were fabricated and characterized , with the device structures of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / LiF / Al and ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / TiO x / Al shown in Figure 6.

Let's think step by step.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide
2. PEDOT : PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate)
3. polymer: Unspecified type of polymer
4. PC71BM: [6,6]-Phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester
5. LiF: Lithium Fluoride
6. Al: Aluminum
7. TiO x: Titanium Oxide.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. ITO
2. PEDOT : PSS
3. polymer (if it is a specific material name, keep it, otherwise remove it)
4. PC71BM
5. LiF
6. Al
7. Titanium Oxide (TiO x)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| polymer (if it is a specific material name, keep it, otherwise remove it) |
| PC71BM |
| LiF |
| Al |
| Titanium Oxide (TiO x) |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Two different types of photovoltaic devices were fabricated and characterized , with the device structures of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / LiF / Al and ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / TiO x / Al shown in Figure 6.

Let's think step by step.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide (an electrode material)
2. PEDOT : PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate) (a conducting polymer)
3. polymer: Unspecified conducting or insulating polymer material
4. PC71BM: Poly[2-methoxy-5-(3,7-bis(trifluoromethyl)phenyl)-1,4-phenylenevinylene-co-2-(4'-biphenyl)-5-(4-tert-butylphenyl)-1,4-phenylenevinylene] (a donor material)
5. LiF: Lithium Fluoride (a thin film material)
6. Al: Aluminum (a metal electrode)
7. TiO x : Titanium Oxide (a thin film material)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide (an electrode material)
2. PEDOT : PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate) (a conducting polymer)
3. polymer: Unspecified conducting or insulating polymer material
4. PC71BM: Poly[2-methoxy-5-(3,7-bis(trifluoromethyl)phenyl)-1,4-phenylenevinylene-co-2-(4'-biphenyl)-5-(4-tert-butylphenyl)-1,4-phenylenevinylene] (a donor material)
5. LiF: Lithium Fluoride (a thin film material)

These entities are relevant as they are materials used in the fabrication of the photovoltaic devices and have specific material properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Indium Tin Oxide (ITO) |
| Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate) (PEDOT : PSS) |
| Unspecified conducting or insulating polymer |
| Poly[2-methoxy-5-(3,7-bis(trifluoromethyl)phenyl)-1,4-phenylenevinylene-co-2-(4'-biphenyl)-5-(4-tert-butylphenyl)-1,4-phenylenevinylene] (PC71BM) |
| Lithium Fluoride (LiF) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Two different types of photovoltaic devices were fabricated and characterized , with the device structures of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / LiF / Al and ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / TiO x / Al shown in Figure 6.

Let's think step by step.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide, a type of conductive material.
2. PEDOT : PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate), a type of conducting polymer.
3. polymer: Unspecified type of polymer used in the fabrication of the photovoltaic devices.
4. PC71BM: A specific type of polymer used in the photovoltaic devices.
5. LiF: Lithium Fluoride, a compound used in the fabrication of one of the photovoltaic devices.
6. TiO x: Titanium Oxide, a compound used in the fabrication of one of the photovoltaic devices.
7. Al: Aluminum, a metal used as a contact layer in the fabrication of both photovoltaic devices.

So, the property values in the paragraph are:

1. ITO
2. PEDOT : PSS
3. polymer (unspecified)
4. PC71BM
5. LiF
6. TiO x
7. Al.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide, a type of conductive material.
2. LiF: Lithium Fluoride, a compound with a specific property.
3. TiO x: Titanium Oxide, a compound with a specific property.

So, the relevant property values in the paragraph are:

1. Indium Tin Oxide
2. Lithium Fluoride
3. Titanium Oxide.

These entities refer to specific materials used in the fabrication of the photovoltaic devices, and their relevance lies in their material properties that contribute to the functioning of the devices.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Indium Tin Oxide (ITO) |
| Lithium Fluoride (LiF) |
| Titanium Oxide (TiO x) |
